themes: empowerment of cultural leaders from the community
key_phrases: Support should go to the cultural leaders who’ve built Austin’s creative community from the ground up
not just the orgs with the most infrastructure
prioritize grassroots orgs, artist collectives, and community-based networks
stop deferring to institutions whose influence comes from consolidation, not consensus
barriers_identified: funding preference for organizations with the most infrastructure
deference to consolidated institutions over community consensus
solutions_proposed: prioritize grassroots orgs, artist collectives, and community-based networks
provide long-term funding to these groups
allow community leaders to lead decision-making
